EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Data_Workshop_Roadshow_2015.Melbourne Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Join Pivotal for a big data exploration of the Internet of Things on July 7th in Melbourne
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/melbourne> Join data technology experts from Pivotal to get the latest perspective on how big data analytics and applications are transforming organizations across industries.
This event provides an opportunity to learn about new developments in the rapidly-changing world of big data and understand best practices in creating Internet of Things (IoT) applications.
Additionally, attendees will engage in hands-on data science and application development training using the market-leading Pivotal Big Data Suite.
Who Should Attend
In addition to addressing industry trends in big data, the sessions and hands-on workshop cover topics of interest to developers, architects, data scientists and technical managers.
AGENDA
8:15 AM – 8:30 AM
Check-In & Breakfast
8:30 AM – 9:30 AM
The Journey to Becoming a Data-Driven Enterprise
9:30 AM – 9:45 AM
Coffee Break
9:45 AM – 11:15 AM
Internet of Things Demo and Architecture Overview
11:15 AM – 12:30 PM
Hands-On Technical Workshop
12:30 PM – 1:00 PM
Lunch
1:00 PM – 2:00 PM
Hands-On Technical Workshop
Register <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/melbourne> now for this exclusive event. The workshop is FREE; space is limited. TUESDAY
July 7, 2015
Cliftons Melbourne
Level 1, 440 Collins Street
Melbourne REGISTER <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/melbourne>
